bill_title: H.R.3492 - 119th Congress (2025-2026): Protect Children’s Innocence Act | Congress.gov | Library of Congress
brief_summary: Shown Here: Introduced in House (05/19/2025) Protect Children’s Innocence Act of 2025 This bill establishes federal criminal offenses for providing gender-affirming care to minors. The bill also changes the existing federal criminal offense that prohibits female genital mutilation (FGM) and related conduct.
